summary: Email correspondence between a federal prosecutor and a law firm regarding a grand jury subpoena to TD Bank N.A. concerning Jeffrey Epstein's accounts. The law firm confirms TD Bank had no accounts in Epstein's name or for which he was a signatory.

persons.name: Maurene Comey
persons.context: Federal prosecutor in the Southern District of New York handling the grand jury subpoena to TD Bank regarding Jeffrey Epstein's accounts.

persons.name: Nicolas Bourtin
persons.context: Law firm attorney responding to the prosecutor's inquiry, confirming TD Bank had no accounts for Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Gillian P. Seaman
persons.context: Copied on the email correspondence regarding the grand jury subpoena to TD Bank.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The individual whose financial accounts were the subject of the grand jury subpoena to TD Bank.

connections.description: Prosecutor and defense attorney communicating about a grand jury subpoena response regarding Jeffrey Epstein's bank accounts.
Attorneys at the same law firm working on the TD Bank subpoena response.
Federal prosecutor investigating Jeffrey Epstein's financial activities via grand jury subpoena.

events.title: Grand Jury Subpoena to TD Bank
events.description: A grand jury subpoena was issued to TD Bank N.A. seeking information about accounts held by or for Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: TD Bank Response on Epstein Accounts
events.description: Law firm representing TD Bank confirms to federal prosecutors that the bank had no accounts in Epstein's name or for which he was a signatory.

locations: 1 St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: TD Bank N.A. confirmed it had no accounts in Jeffrey Epstein's name or for which he was a signatory, in response to a grand jury subpoena.
The subpoena was issued on October 3, 2019, as part of a federal investigation into Epstein's finances.
The correspondence occurred in November 2019, after Epstein's death in August 2019, indicating ongoing posthumous investigations.
The email is marked 'CONFIDENTIAL TREATMENT REQUESTED', highlighting the sensitive nature of the grand jury investigation.
